Articles.Content: I just want to save my craft.. Why is it when I go to load one theres a dozen duplicates? How the heck the does this system work? Why take something that worked and was simple and make it complicated?
The system works really well on paper, but the problem is how they brought it off the paper.

7 hours ago, Missingno200 said:

The system works really well on paper, but the problem is how they brought it off the paper.

It was late last night so I forgot to include the main reason I posted this. No auto save craft on Launch. I built a whole Mun mission. Forgot to save the work space and went to launch. I reverted then loaded another craft. The previous one was lost.

2 hours ago, Motokid600 said:

It was late last night so I forgot to include the main reason I posted this. No auto save craft on Launch. I built a whole Mun mission. Forgot to save the work space and went to launch. I reverted then loaded another craft. The previous one was lost.

Aw damn, that's really unfortunate. Usually the workspace gets autosaved, so that's absolutely terrible and I'm sorry to hear that.
